function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Pivoting business operations to selling face masks may lead to increased physical interaction and potential spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission within the community, leading to potential outbreaks and lockdowns.","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to public health guidelines, use of personal protective equipment, and regular testing for employees and customers.","Technologies":"Contactless delivery systems, online ordering platforms, and mobile payment options to minimize physical interaction.","People":"Customers, employees, and the broader community in Melbourne, Australia.","Owner":"Business owners, local health authorities, and policymakers."},{"Description":"Lack of resilience and crisis management at the micro and macro levels may result in prolonged business closures and economic instability.","Impact":"Economic downturn, loss of jobs, financial hardship for businesses and individuals, and long-term negative effects on the community's well-being.","Mitigation":"Implementing robust crisis management plans, providing financial assistance and support for businesses, and investing in economic stimulus programs.","Technologies":"Remote work and collaboration tools, digital financial platforms, and data analytics for economic forecasting.","People":"Entrepreneurs, employees, government policymakers, and the general population.","Owner":"Government agencies, business owners, and economic development organizations."}]}
